body_html: My main initial review question is why this PR modifies so many files in core. We're trying to keep alternate RPC implementations in contrib for the time being. Are there any special difficulties with putting this stuff into contrib?
body_text: My main initial review question is why this PR modifies so many files in core.   We're trying to keep alternate RPC implementations in contrib for the time being.  Are there any special difficulties with putting this stuff into contrib?
